thread.title: Actor Randy Quaid says he could be deported next week
thread.title_full: Actor Randy Quaid says he could be deported next week

title: Actor Randy Quaid says he could be deported next week
text:
Actor Randy Quaid says he could be deported next week   7, 2015 at 5:01 PM   7, 2015 at 5:01 PM EDT 
TORONTO (AP) â€” American actor Randy Quaid says he could be deported from Canada next week and says he'd like to make movies in the U.S. again. 
Quaid says he was detained by Canada Border Services on Tuesday. Immigration and Refugee Board spokesman Robert Gervais confirms the arrest and says Quaid will have a detention review hearing Thursday. Officials are unable to give further details. 
Quaid told The Associated Press he has a deportation order for Tuesday, and Thursday's hearing is about whether he can remain in Canada. 
Quaid and his Canadian wife fled the U.S. in 2010, saying they were victims of persecution. They've sought to stay in Canada and have said they were being hunted by "Hollywood star-whackers," but they face legal problems in the U.S. 
Quaid's bid for permanent residency in Canada was denied in 2012.
